parser states.from sentence: In this work , we adapt the training criterion so as to explore parser states drawn not only from the training data , but also from the model as it is being learned .

dynamically chose.from sentence: To do so , we use the method of to dynamically chose an optimal ( relative to the final attachment accuracy ) action given an imperfect history .

interpolating.from sentence: By interpolating between algorithm states sampled from the model and those sampled from the training data , more robust predictions at test time can be made .
